# tuiInit  
Initialize screen & create a new context  

## C  
`short int hCTX tuiInit();`  

## ASM  
`>LIBCALL hLIBTUI,LIBTUI.Init`  

## RETURN VALUE  
CC = success, A = hCTX  

# tuiClose  
destroy context and all sub objects  

## C  
`void fastcall tuiClose(short int hCTX);`  

## ASM  
`lda hCTX`  
`>LIBCALL hLIBTUI,LIBTUI.Close`  

## RETURN VALUE  
CC = success
